message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $110, but I think the product is worth more than that. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
